name: Deja-vu
description:
Game made for One Hour Of The Week Jam #2 (Theme: The Same)

Little platformer made in an hour in which you repeat the same level several times.

Controls:

  • Left/Right arrow - Move
  • Up arrow - Jump

Made by:

  • gubebra (https://gubebra.itch.io/)
  • mikomoares(https://mikomoares.itch.io/)
